website_summaries.verdict: Great price point on a classic loafer with a comfortable fit.
pros: Look like classy Italian shoes minus the sticker price
Great option for work, and comes in several width options for a more customized fit
The snake and leopard print options are not your grandma’s loafer
cons: Can stretch out easily, and become slippy on the feet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pointed Loafer!
customer_reviews.text: I looked for the perfect pointed loafer for months! and they were always too narrow, or too pointed or to flat or too wide.... the list went on and on. Finally I came across these and i too the chance. Really thinking i was going to be disappointed.. I took the advice of the other reviewers and got half a size smaller with Wide fit, and they not only look amazing high end but are super comfy. They do fit snug, so i am not sure wearing with socks will fly. Although, after some wear, they will loosen up a bit. I do plan on wearing these with stockings.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled by the name
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my size but to my surprise and disappointment, they don’t fit right. I couldn’t wait to put them on (having been looking for a pair of comfortable shoes for a long time) and jumped into my car to stores. I couldn’t even walk after I got out of my car. The shoes just kept slipping off my feet. I tried to put all kinds of grips inside, but nothing worked.
customer_reviews.author: Mayflower

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are BEAUTIFUL and very classy! However, the fit is odd, to say the least. I've never owned a shoe that was simultaneously too big AND too small...but these somehow manage it. They are very loose throughout the insole and heel...but the toe narrows down to a death point! I'm keeping them in the hope that they will stretch out a little across the toe. Good luck to me!
customer_reviews.author: John B. Gravlee

customer_reviews.title: Buy your size!
customer_reviews.text: I am a pretty solid size 6 1/2. I read some reviews that said these run narrow/small and to size up a little. So I ordered a 7. I really, REALLY love these shoes. They have a classic but also fun look to them. The down side- they do stretch a bit and the 7's are too big. The don't flop off of my feet but I feel them lift every time I walk. I'm going to try a heel insert or something to see if that helps. I've worn these about 5 times so I can't exchange them.
customer_reviews.author: AndyGirl

customer_reviews.title: I like them!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't worn them yet but tried them on (no socks) they fit perfectly. Not tight or loose. I'll only wear no show socks anyway, so not worried about the fit. I'm a size 7 regular width and it's a treat fit! They are comfortable and look exactly as pictured in terms if style and color. I thought they'd look cheap bc they aren't real leather but they don't.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Size down 1/2 size!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful shoes!! Love love them! However, the 3 stars is because after only ONE wear they stretched out so much I can’t wear them anymore. I will be returning for a different size. I’d say size down a half size. Otherwise they are great and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tess C.

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfy as expected but cute
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting that the soles would be more comfortable with better arch support since they are Dr. Scholl's brand, but they look cute and I've gotten compliments on them. I walk to and from my work at an office, so I'm always looking for shoes that look professional but are durable and comfortable to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: These shoes look sleek and chic and are SO comfortable! Like walking on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look sleek and chic and are SO comfortable! Like walking on a cloud. They are just a tad large but not even half a size too big, just a little roomy. And they don't make my feet sweaty!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hill

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable <3
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with these. I almost NEVER find shoes that come in wide, so I was delighted that these came in my size AND they were cute. Took about a day to wear in (the back was a little irritating at first) but now they are the most comfortable shoes I own. Might get them in another color :)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: A very pretty and well-made shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are elegant, as the name claims, and beautifully crafted. They have a very expensive look to them—close to an Italian made shoe. They do run a little narrow in the toe area as pointed shoes tend to run, so be aware that you might have a little breaking in to do in that area. All around, a very pretty, well-made shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable and stylish flat!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 'go to' summer flat - since I live in a warm climate... I can wear these all seasons!!! The color is chic and very versatile and the insert is extremely comfortable. You can dress these up or wear with jeans! I wear these when I am traveling running through airports also! I need a 10W and these fit true to size! Highly recommend. I also purchased in a black patent leather and a black suede!
customer_reviews.author: HotLanta

customer_reviews.title: Love the overall look...
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I ordered my normal size but in a wide. I think it was a good choice expect that they seem to have an odd fit on the instep just in front of the heel. I love the overall, pointed toe loafer look and the price was right so I’m keeping them! Hoping they don’t stretch out too much
customer_reviews.author: mamag1997

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and very stylish and chic on the foot. I wasn’t sure how i would like them based on the pics but in person and on the foot they’re exactly what I was looking for in a leopard shoe. These take my basic outfits up another notch. They look especially fantastic with dark rinse jeans. Did I mention they’re super comfortable?
customer_reviews.author: PamL425

customer_reviews.title: Classic but Long
customer_reviews.text: These are a classic loafer without being too stuffy (think your grandpa's penny loafers) and the soles are very comfortable. However I found that these ran very long, and for them to fit without falling off my heels I had to order a full size larger than usual, and I would say that they are relatively narrow.
customer_reviews.author: hannahjean

customer_reviews.title: Pointy toe and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a black Loafer for awhile, something that looks like the Everlane black loafer, with out the high price tag. Came across these, they look a lot like the Everlane, and are quit comfortable. Took two short wearings before they were broke in. I love them and am really pleased with the way they look.
customer_reviews.author: Pattie A. Rutters

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shoe in a 9W leopard print and I love them. I wanted a brown shoe but nothing drab and dull. I usually wear a 9.5 in flats but this came in a 9W and purchased that size. The toe is slightly narrow but not bad. Very comfortable wore them to work and received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: shoe addict

customer_reviews.title: Love how these look
customer_reviews.text: Love how these look, but they are very stiff, so I had to return them. I wanted something comfortable straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: C. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if ordering half a size smaller would be comfortable due to toes feeling perfect in my normal size
customer_reviews.text: Odd fit. Fit correctly in toes but too big in heel. Had to move my foot back to heel in order to stay on. Not sure if ordering half a size smaller would be comfortable due to toes feeling perfect in my normal size. Super cute though and comfortable sole
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Would be great for someone with a wider foot
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little large, but used an insert to help with that. Would be great for someone with a wider foot. Lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Huge Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The left shoe fits very well. The right shoe, however, is too large and slips off my foot at every step. I wish I had returned them. Unless I can find an insert that will make the right shoe stay on, this purchase was a COMPLETE waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute & comfy, but slightly used
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the shoe and the built-in heel slips, but when I received them it looked as though they had been worn before and previously returned before I bought them. There’s a scuff on the left side of the left shoe and the right shoe’s “tag” on the insole is peeling. While none of this is enough to make me return these (since my size is now out of stock), it’s disappointing to see them in less than perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too runs too small
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but runs too small in the shank - no way to fix that even if you order a larger size
customer_reviews.author: A. Kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: True to size and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Size 9 fits pretty true but there will still be room for socks if needed. Pony hair style is incredibly cute and looks amazing in person - have LOVED wearing these!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Beamer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet with bunions but normal heels. these shoes have a little cushion around the top of the heel to hold the heel. They are also very cushiony and comfortable. AND i got them on sale...can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Bb

customer_reviews.title: too  narrow in the toe box area
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoe but had to rate it low as the toe box is extremely narrow. I like a pointed shoe but for some reason this one is way to narrow however it is well made and the heel area is comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Carl Hurtig

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Fit is good and they are comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but toooo SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe, just opened as a gift and they are a size to SMALL :(
customer_reviews.author: JimmyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, comfortable fit, but I'm just not a long pointy toe girl. Agonized over the decision but decided to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute shoe. Normal size is 7. 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoe. Normal size is 7.5 and had to return the shoe. Toes were too tight and scrunched up due to the pointed toe. Going to exchange for size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Tin ma'am

customer_reviews.title: great work flat
customer_reviews.text: super comfortable but a little big in the heel on me. I really love the style; they're great for work!
customer_reviews.author: dogmombk

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable Shoes! They are exactly what I was looking for. The shoe is made very well and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Campbell

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe!! Calf hair, comfort and stylish! Want more in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Kallie H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Order half size up. Very cute on and comfortable once you get the right fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great everyday shoe. I’m looking for other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Y

customer_reviews.title: the shoes are kind of uncomfortable and are giving me ...
customer_reviews.text: the shoes are kind of uncomfortable and are giving me blisters - I'm hoping they will soften as I break them in
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Scarpato

customer_reviews.title: they r not flexible as i like.
customer_reviews.text: were too wide for my narrow feet even w/socks, & socks made the tops press on my big toenail. they r not flexible as i like.
customer_reviews.author: willwe

customer_reviews.title: Very nice !!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe. Perfect for work. True to size, no need to order bigger if you have wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: margarita montandon

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about these shoes. Classic chic look and comfortable too. Wish they offered more with patterns and other prints. They are my new go to shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Gemini83

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Don't size up just because they are pointy toe.
customer_reviews.author: Esander

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They are so comfy and cute. Perfect for work or going out.
customer_reviews.author: Celine

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable flats. This is my third pair of Dr. Scholl's in this style and they have all been so comfortable and classic looking. I receive many compliments whenever I wear these.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE! I wet between a 9-9.5, so I bought these in a 9.5 wide. They are PERFECT! Comfortable, no break in period and so fashionable! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ravens10

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe in a 9 WIDE. I am a teacher and on my feet a LOT! These are so comfy! They do not squish my toes at all, and I got so many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Waldroup

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Loved this shoe and super comfy, but ended up going with something slightly less dressy.
customer_reviews.author: WearyAdventurer

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not only stylish, but, they are true to fit and comfortable. This is my second pair of Dr. Scholl's shoes. They are well made and long lasting. I will surely buy others.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Talley

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments all the time with the shoe and it's pretty comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!! Looks good with the color red.
customer_reviews.text: The price of product. In a local retail store in my hometown was going to cost me $90.00 way more than i purchased from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: A very nice loafer. The leather is soft
customer_reviews.text: A very nice loafer. The leather is soft. The texture is pleasing to the eye. The shoes are comfy. Very nice with trousers our even skinny jeans.
customer_reviews.author: GirlfriendNJ

customer_reviews.title: They look great and I get many compliments
customer_reviews.text: No one knows they are Dr Scholls. They look great and I get many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Anne P.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful! You will want one in every color. :D
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Does not slip up and down on heel. Very comfortable shoe that does not need to be broken into.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmax5

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe but is really small
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe but is really small...I can consistently wear a size 10 and this fit like a 9.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice shoe but it’s too big. I wear a size 7 and probably should’ve gotten a size 6 1/2. It also hurts a little close to the point of the shoe when I walk but I’m sure after some time to break it in, it will feel a lot comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shaundra Ware

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Normally wear a 7.5 M but read the reviews and ordered a 7W. Fits perfect! Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Shoe Is A Slightly Different Color
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit like a 10. Toes are not so pointy as to compress a bunion or aggravate Morton's neuromas. The heels do slip a little when flexing the foot. I am not bothered by this, but I can see how a skinnier heel would have a problem. My only qualm is that the L shoe's vamp is ever-so-slightly a darker/more orangey color than the R shoe's vamp. I didn't notice this until I was seated in a bright room - so it's not that noticeable. Be that as it may, I am surprised that quality control didn't notice the discrepancy. The memory foam soles make my feet sweaty. They're comfortable, but hot.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Dweller

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but small fit
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are beautiful, and they seem they would be very comfortable. I ordered a half-size larger than I normally wear, and the shoes were still too small. They are quite narrow, especially at the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Cute & comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love how comfortable these are. And they are stylish too- great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AMomOnTheRun

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: These looked like they would be too narrow, but they fit beautifully! Also, the sole really is comfortable. I am very happy with these. To be honest, the product photos on the listing made the shoes seem a little wonky/deformed, and I was pretty sure I was going to hate them in real life, but they look so much nicer in person. I'm glad I gave them a chance and they will sail me through some upcoming job interviews.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They’re so comfortable and I have gotten so many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, but order a smaller size!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe with memory foam for added comfort. I have been looking for a leopard loafer for ages that does not look dowdy and these are striking. However they are ginormous! I ordered my usual size and am stepping right out of them. Very disappointing about the size. I wish there had been reviews when I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes. They look elegant and perfect for work when you don't want to wear heels.
customer_reviews.author: Julieta

customer_reviews.title: if you are in between sizes go with the smaller half size but I love them. GREAT quality
customer_reviews.text: I wear 9 1/2 and 10 but this runs big, if you are in between sizes go with the smaller half size but I love them. GREAT quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but not for my narrow foot!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shoes but they were too wide for my narrow feet!
customer_reviews.author: Marla Blain

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and amazing
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and amazing! So chic and comfortable - my new favorite shoe. Runs slightly large. My foot is on the more slender side, and I usually wear an 8 in boots and 7.5 in heels, and 7.5 in this style fit best. The pointed toe does not compress toes at all, and the inner gel liner is like walking in slippers. The animal print calf hair looks high end. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: H V S

customer_reviews.title: Shoes run small and narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are nice but run very small. I wear a size 9 and these are tight without stockings. Also I ordered 9m and the also are very narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with them the minute I put them in my feet. So comfortable that I wore them to a out side festival. Not once did my feet hurt and received many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes. I have very sensitive heels, so I'm still trying to break these in.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Run a bit larger
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look and feel of the outside of the shoes but the wide was to wide. Unfortunately felt comfortable...wished they would have fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy. Gregoire

product_meta.title: Dr. Scholl's Shoes Women's Elegant Slip-On Loafer
product_meta.description: Clean, simple and modern. get the understated style of this loafer in a wide range of finishes and colors. pointed toe. memory foam cool fit insole. leather wrapped stacked heel.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
